ai-patthana24.18:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.18:0.3_0: Not for the sake of his (good) wrapped in the womb,
ai-patthana24.18:1.1_0: You don’t give a teaching for the sake of refuge. You don’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.18:2.1_0: You don’t give rise to cause or reason for a refuge.
ai-patthana24.18:3.1_0: or cause or reasons not give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.18:3.1_1: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana24.18:3.1_2: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana24.18:3.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
